name: SUPER HEXAGONS!
description:
Use WASD to move.Use mouse to aim and left mouse button to shoot

Protect the red octagon and destroy the hexagon. you lose if the octagon dies and you win if hexagon dies

when you shoot the hexagon it leaves health packs that can be picked up by you. health is restored when the hexagon and octagon collide. if you haven't picked up health packs and the hexagon and octagon collide, the hexagon will damage the octagon.

note: if you press play again and the frame rate drops, close the game and open it again.

this game can be pretty hard at first.
